priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Contact Case Investigation Contact Type Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C102575

self.title: CDISC SDTM Contact Case Investigation Contact Type Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the identification and clinical investigation of disease contacts.
name: Contact Case Investigation Contact Type
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Contact Case Investigation Contact Type Terminology

terms.definition: A way of contracting a disease through everyday interactions (nonsexual) with an infected person.
A way of contracting a disease by interacting with an individual that has been exposed to the disease while undergoing a medical procedure.
terms.preferredTerm: Contact With Exposure During Medical Procedure
terms.submissionValue: CONTACT WITH EXPOSURE DURING MEDICAL PROCEDURE

terms.definition: A way of contracting a disease by physically associating with an infected group of individuals.
terms.preferredTerm: Contact With Exposure In Crowd Setting
terms.submissionValue: CONTACT WITH EXPOSURE IN CROWD SETTING

terms.definition: A way of contracting a disease by interacting with an individual that is considered at high risk for having the disease.
A way of contracting a disease through interactions with an infected person in the same residence.
